typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		item_id as string,
		item_desc as string,
		current_price as double,
		wholesale_price as double,
		brand_id as integer,
		brand as string,
		class_id as integer,
		class as string,
		category_id as integer,
		category as string,
		manufact_id as integer,
		manufact as string,
		size as string,
		promo_id as integer,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		discount_cost as double,
		promo_name as string,
		promo_type as string,
		min_qty as integer,
		max_qty as integer,
		discount_active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> postgresSQLItemInfo
source(output(
		HK_ITEM_ID as string,
		ITEM_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLHubItemLookup
postgresSQLItemInfo select(mapColumn(
		item_id,
		item_desc,
		current_price,
		wholesale_price,
		brand_id,
		brand,
		class_id,
		class,
		category_id,
		category,
		manufact_id,
		manufact,
		size,
		promo_id,
		start_date,
		end_date,
		discount_cost,
		promo_name,
		promo_type,
		min_qty,
		max_qty,
		discount_active
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTableData
SelectTableData derive(HK_ITEM_ID = md5(item_id),
		LOAD_DTS = currentTimestamp(),
		REC_SRC = 'ITEM_INFO') ~> Expression
LookupAzureSQLHubItem alterRow(insertIf(AzureSQLHubItemLookup@ITEM_ID)) ~> UpdateStrategy
Expression, AzureSQLHubItemLookup lookup(SelectTableData@item_id == AzureSQLHubItemLookup@ITEM_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupAzureSQLHubItem
UpdateStrategy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		HK_ITEM_ID as string,
		ITEM_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HK_ITEM_ID,
		ITEM_ID = item_id,
		LOAD_DTS,
		REC_SRC
	)) ~> AzureSQLHubItem
